casebody.data:
James Bryan SLUDER
v.
Marilyn W. SLUDER No. 185P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Charles R. Brewer, Attorney at Law, Asheville, For Sluder, Marilyn W. Diane K. McDonald, Attorney at Law, Asheville, For Sluder, James Bryan Jim Siemens, Attorney at Law, Asheville, For Sluder, James Bryan

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 16th of May 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Davis, J., recused
